com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration

Class Cannon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Weapon
      • com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Cannon

  • public class Cannon
extends Weapon
    This class is used for creating Cannon objects; it is a subclass of Weapon.
    Author:
    Wyatt Byroade

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cannon

        public Cannon(double cost,
              int weight,
              int condition,
              int hitPoints)
        Constructor for Cannon class; takes arguments for cost, weight, condition and hitPoints.

        Runs constructor of parent class(Weapon) then runs some Cannon-specific methods and sets Cannon-specific fields.

        Parameters:
        cost - double cost of weapon
        weight - int weight of weapon
        condition - int condition of weapon(1-100)
        hitPoints - int hitPoints of weapon
